Visit Main Site

Documentation to help you edit, update and create content for your site.

Logging In To Your Account

Visit Github.com to sign in to your account.

Click the ‘Sign In’ button in the top right hand corner of the page.

Enter your details into the form and click the ‘Sign In’ button.

Once you’ve logged in click the second link (thetanewzealand/thetanewzealand) on the left menu.

From here you will be able to edit what content the website displays.

NOTE: A lot of the files on this page are best left untouched - Scroll down for more information on editing and adding files

File Structure

To edit a page you will need to click on the edit button in the top right hand corner

Adding a New Programme

To edit a page you will need to click on the edit button in the top right hand corner

Adding to the About Us Section

To edit a page you will need to click on the edit button in the top right hand corner

Adding a new Resource

To edit a page you will need to click on the edit button in the top right hand corner

Editing an existing page

To edit a page you will need to click on the edit button in the top right hand corner

Styling your content

This section will show you how to style your content.

Headings

There are several different sizes of heading, these are styled as follows.

# Heading 1
## Heading 2
### Heading 3
#### Heading 4

This will produce the following:

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Heading 4

Links

You can add links to your pages, this is done as follows.

[Visit Google](https://www.google.com)

This will produce:

Visit Google
